articles.title: WT API is currently unavailable
articles.author: System
articles.content: The upstream WT server timed out (504). This is a local fallback article so your website still works. Replace this file with real exported articles if you want reliability.

articles.title: How to make this site reliable
articles.author: System
articles.content: Solution: snapshot articles into /data/articles_fallback.json during build, or host your own backend. Client-side cannot fix a 504 from wt.kpi.fei.tuke.sk.
